name: get_all_stats
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool free_nba.
Tool description: Unofficial NBA API for Historical NBA Data
API description: Retrieves all basketball statistics based on the given query parameters.

page.description: The page number, used for pagination.

per_page.description: The number of results returned per call, used for pagination.

player_ids.description: A comma-separated string of player IDs.

dates.description: A comma-separated string of dates formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

game_ids.description: A comma-separated string of game IDs.
